name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. John D'AMBRO, Appellant

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. John D’AMBRO, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
Judgment of Sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Joseph C. Santaguida, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., David Michelman, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
356 A.2d 358
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. John D’AMBRO, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 30, 1976.
Decided May 12, 1976.
Joseph C. Santaguida, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., David Michelman, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
